title: Waymo keeps foot on the autonomous vehicle pedal with $16B funding
description:
Waymo plans to continue its expansion across locations, citing statistics showing that self-driving cars are safer than human drivers.

The post Waymo keeps foot on the autonomous vehicle pedal with $16B funding appeared first on The Robot Report.
